description: Enhanced CREATE_PLOT_CODE with beautiful color mapping and improved defaults
changes: Updated CREATE_PLOT_CODE default values: showLine=true, showPoints=true, color='green'
Added beautiful color mapping system with 13 predefined colors including vibrant options
Color mapping includes: red, blue, green, yellow, black, gray/grey, orange, purple, pink, brown, maroon, cyan, slate
All colors use beautiful hex codes for better visual appeal (e.g., green=#40C9A2, purple=#8B5CF6)
Color parameter now accepts both color names and hex codes for flexibility
Default color changed from red to green for better visual aesthetics
Added getColorHex helper function for robust color handling
